description: Try our easy to follow Veggies With Gremolata recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ vegetables,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Veggies With Gremolata Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue grill on medium heat. In a medium pan over high heat, blanch broccoli in boiling water for 2 minutes. Drain and refresh under cold running water.

Combine herbs, lemon juice and 2 1/2 tbs oil in a bowl. Season. Brush pumpkin and onion with two-thirds of the herb dressing. Toss broccoli in remaining dressing. Barbecue pumpkin and onion for 4-5 minutes on each side and broccoli for 2 minutes on each side or until charred and tender.
Meanwhile, combine parsley, zest, chilli, garlic and remaining oil in a bowl and set aside.
Transfer vegetables to a serving plate. Drizzle over oil mixture and scatter over parmesan. Serve.
